title: In-Service Elementary Teacher Language Education Competency Enhancement Program Using Online Flipped Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Competency in basic digital education tools and understanding of elementary language education theory
context.additional_context: Program for in-service elementary teachers to enhance language education expertise in the post-COVID-19 educational landscape, emphasizing blended learning readiness and teacher-centered participatory lesson design capabilities.

learning_goals: Learners can design five or more online language lesson modules by applying the flipped learning model.
Learners can apply peer-reviewed instructional materials to real-world contexts with over 80% suitability through peer assessment and feedback.
Learners can develop and implement at least three learner-centered activities using digital collaboration tools.

resources: OER (Open Educational Resources) for Language Education

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
